summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackDermalogica's Daily Glycolic Cleanser undoes dullness with every wash. This gentle, jelly formula cleanses away brightness blockers that build up on skin daily and conditions skin to keep it looking luminous.
details: DetailsBenefitsBrightening and conditioningRenews dull, uneven skin toneHelps remove buildup caused by environmental factors such as pollution and dead skin cells that build upKey IngredientsGlycolic Acid: effectively exfoliates the skin It blasts dullness and uneven skin tone by dissolving dulling dead skin cells for brighter-looking skinCalendula Extract: derived from the marigold flower, this botanical extract helps visibly calm and soothe skin while delivering antioxidant benefitsJojoba Seed Oil: a lightweight, skin-identical oil that conditions and softens skin, helping to preserve the skin's moisture barrier with each cleanseAllantoin: conditions and protects, while providing the skin with essential nourishment and antioxidantsFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesSynthetic FragranceItem 2583210How To UseMassage onto dampened face and neck. Rinse with warm water. Precaution: Use and frequency only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation persists, discontinue use and consult a physician. AHAs may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun. It is recommended that prior to exposure to the sun, users cover areas where AHAs have been applied with a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure for a week afterwards. Contact of the product with the skin must be of limited frequency or duration.Precautions: Use and frequency only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation persists, discontinue use and consult a physician. AHAs may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun. It is recommended that prior to exposure to the sun, users cover areas where AHAs have been applied with a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure for a week afterwards. Contact of the product with the skin must be of limited frequency or duration.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Glycolic Acid, Glycerin, Peg-6 Cocamide, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Succinoglycan, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Urea, Allantoin, Polyquaternium-51, Trehalose, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate, Glyceryl Oleate, Coconut Acid, 1,2-Hexanediol, T-Butyl Alcohol, Coco-Glucoside, Sodium Pca, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Limonene.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Massage onto dampened face and neck. Rinse with warm water. Precaution: Use and frequency only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation persists, discontinue use and consult a physician. AHAs may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun. It is recommended that prior to exposure to the sun, users cover areas where AHAs have been applied with a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure for a week afterwards. Contact of the product with the skin must be of limited frequency or duration.Precautions: Use and frequency only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation persists, discontinue use and consult a physician. AHAs may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun. It is recommended that prior to exposure to the sun, users cover areas where AHAs have been applied with a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure for a week afterwards. Contact of the product with the skin must be of limited frequency or duration.

reviews.headline: Acne gone
reviews.comments: I have used so many products. But this product here, when i started using it and after i wash my face, i clean it using a wash cloth ajd alcohol.  I have had no more issues with acne and the black marks from pimples are fading away. The best, by far on the market for my type of skin

reviews.headline: Acne gone
reviews.comments: I have used so many products. But this product here, when i started using it and after i wash my face, i clean it using a wash cloth ajd alcohol.  I have had no more issues with acne and the black marks from pimples are fading away. The best, by far on the market for my type of skin

reviews.headline: Brighter skin
reviews.comments: I noticed my face looked more fresh and bright after each use. It just doesnt leave a squeaky clean feel after but more of a moisturizing feel.

reviews.headline: Repeat
reviews.comments: Def a repeat item that I will ALWAYS repurchase!

reviews.headline: Cleared my acne
reviews.comments: I'm 38 years old and my face literally hates everything, it breaks out no matter what I use, BUT this actually cleared my acne. I'm giving it 4 stars because my face is constantly pink/red so this must be irritating/drying it, but it's better than the acne so I'll take it.

reviews.headline: Gave me acne
reviews.comments: I found this product made my face oily resulting in acne for me. I have tried to use it on 2 separate occassions and both times I got acne from using it.

reviews.headline: Love this cleanser
reviews.comments: I alternate between this cleanser and another-morning and night. Glycolic is good for clarifying the skin.

reviews.headline: Cleans well
reviews.comments: I like the packaging. My face feels clean afterwards. Not drying

reviews.headline: Worth to try if you have acne
reviews.comments: In general I have sensitive, acne prone, combo skin with acne marks. I've been using the product almost a year now. Definetly helped with my acne, cleared out my skin, and brightened my acne marks. The only two cons: after couple of uses started to dry my skin. I need to apply thick moisturizer after cleansing and the pump could be bigger. But the product is price worth, lasts for a long time.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Love this product! Cleanses well and brightens skin.

reviews.headline: Wow
reviews.comments: I am so happy I found this cleanser.  My Skinceuticals Glycolic cleanser ran out and it was out of stock for the longest time so I had to find an alternative.  I found this and my oily, acne prone skin has been glowing ever since.  I've come accustomed to waking up with at least one break out and this product has cleared my skin and has kept it clear for over a month.  I highly recommend it to the mid 30s+ girlies who have tried it all.  I will definitely been repurchasing!

reviews.headline: A New Staple
reviews.comments: I really wish this cleanser hadn't been gifted to me, because I don't know if I can justify buying a cleanser over $50. But let me just tell you right now that this cleanser works! Its simple and effective. I have used for about 3 months now on my face, chest and shoulders. I've had zero major breakouts and my skin looks significantly brightened and smoothed. I'll be purchasing my next bottle.

reviews.headline: Too drying for oily but mature skin.
reviews.comments: This felt great going on and bery cleansing/refreshing. However it was a bit too drying for my semi-oily but still 30 year old skin. Would've been a GODSEND when I was a teen though. Highly recommend for oily acne prone skin type. If products irritate or dry your skin out easily though this is probably also not for you. Also i was using this once a week, not daily.

reviews.headline: Wish I had found this years ago!
reviews.comments: I have always struggled with acne and combination skin. A lot of acne targeting cleansers are too harsh and dry my skin out, while doing little to really help reduce my acne. This cleanser was a game changer. I got it on sale for half price and wish I had bought the bigger bottle. I use it daily, morning and night and find it doesn't dry out my skin (paired with a good lotion after of course), and reduces my breakouts remarkably. A year ago I was too self conscious of my acne to leave the house without makeup, now I love that I can. It has also helped to tighten my pores, brighten dark spots/scarring from acne, and generally just make my skin look and feel fresh and radiant.

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: This cleanser is amazing. I have not been using it that long and can already tell a difference in how my skin looks and feels.

reviews.headline: Love this cleanser
reviews.comments: I'm SUPER picky about my cleansers. I bought this during the most recent beauty steal days and I am obsessed! I have really sensitive skin and naturally am more red. This has relieved some of the redness in my skin and overall makes my skin super soft! Bonus - it feels like it really cleanses my skin and does not irritate it. It is also the perfect amount of foaming action.

reviews.headline: so awesome
reviews.comments: it cleanses thoroughly and leaves my skin prepped for the biolum-c serum and gel moisturizer. I received them in a skin brightening kit. I just had to buy the full size of each. In just 5 days my skin has a glass like finish and looks so much healthier. way to glow!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: This is the first time I bought this product and I love it. I already ordered more from this line

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: After several times using it my skin looks brighter

reviews.headline: I dont know what this is doing
reviews.comments: Im used to soaps foaming. This doesn't foam, its like a serum that you put all over your face and then wash off. My face does look a little brighter, but other than that, i dont know what is is doing

values.label: A little goes a long way
Love the effectiveness of this goodness

display_values: A little goes a long way
Does not dry out my skin
Love the effectiveness of this goodness

faceoff_positive.comments: I received the Daily Glycolic Cleanser complimentary from Dermalogica (ULTA Team) - and what a gift it is! I struggle with adult acne and recently have been breaking out more than usual after returning home from traveling (likely a combination of changing temps + wearing a mask on a plane and in Ubers). This cleanser has been SO helpful in rebalancing my skin. I love that it's gentle enough to use daily, and it helps exfoliate and purge my skin of all the harsh environmental factors. In just a week or two I have seen a marked difference in the brightness, tone, and texture of my skin. The ONLY thing I dislike about this product is the pump - if you push even a bit too hard you will end up with way more product than needed, which can lead to waste. But if you push gently you can likely get the right amount out. Other than that, excellent product and I love the results!
faceoff_positive.headline: Skin Clearing

faceoff_negative.comments: Received this complimentary from Dermalogica. I was intrigued by this cleanser because I tend to love glycolic exfoliants. I agree that this is gentle enough for daily use but I don't find that it makes a noticeable difference in the brightness of my skin. It's an OK cleanser but probably not one I would gravitate towards again. I also wish the spout of the dispenser was a bit longer because it can be hard to dispense the product properly unless I tilt the bottle.
faceoff_negative.headline: Just OK
